runs.comm: starts with a fullish ball on leg stump, swept to fine leg
this one's on off, Fletcher drops it to the of side and wants a single but is sent back by the non-striker
on middle, looks to sweep that to fine leg but doesn't quite get hold of it
punched off the backfoot towards mid-off, no run again, great over from Jayasuriya  so far
on middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on this time, Fletcher gets a single
Simmons gets a single by punching that one to long-on, retains the strike with that one
was angling for the blockhole this time, ends up as a low full toss outside legstump, the batsman gets a leading edge to third man for a streaky boundary
Maling loses his radar here, that was way down the leg side, and it keeps low as well to beat Sangakkara to run away for four
batsman looks to shuffle across and flick, is hit on the pads but that ball was sliding down the leg, so no chance of an lbw
length ball in the corridor outside off, the batsman swings and misses
this time the batsman makes contact, slapped towards extra cover
Fletcher goes for a wild swing, it was dug in short by Malinga and Fletcher's swipe is nowhere near the ball
down the leg side, that's a wide, so wide that Sangakkara can't collect it, Mendis makes a valiant attempt to stop that one at fine leg but can't cut it off
the batsman comes down the track and plays it towards mid-on for a single
Simmons goes for the heave this time after backing away, doesn't make contact but he had his back foot in the crease as Sangakkara took off the bails
tries to loft that over mid-off, a bit of a mis-hit, still manages to clear the fielder and get West Indies a couple
slightly tossed up by Jaysuriya, the batsman get on his knee and swipes that to midwicket for a boundary
this time the batsman stands tall and swings it over the mid-off fielder for another boundary, this is turning into a good over for West Indies
guided to third man for a couple to end a great over for West Indies
Shot! Fletcher hammers a fullish ball on legstump over midwicket, that was a massive six
superb reply from Malinga, slower full toss has the leg stump on the ground, Fletcher was through with his shot way too early, he was aiming to deposit the ball in the crowd behind midwicket
another yorker from Malinga, almost got past Marshall, gets his bat down just in time
back of a length ball outside off, chops it down to third man for a single
that was an extremely quick bouncer, 147kmh, not sure Marshall saw that one, barely manages to get under it in time
pushed towards short cover for a single to keep the strike
slower ball outside off, Marshall is foxed by that one and is beaten
that's very wide, short and pitched way outside off and went away further with the angle
another wide from Udana, goes for the slower ball but it slips and ends up as a loopy full toss down the leg side
short and wide, Marshall has that one racing past the backward point fielder for a boundary
length ball and pretty wide, the batsman wanted a repeat of the previous boundary, but gets a thick bottom edge towards the off side
another wide from Udana, none of those have even been borderline cases, all way off the mark
the switch has helped, this ball was full and just outside off, batsman can't get bat on it
yorker on off this time, hammered towards mid-on where Jayawardene does the fielding
short and seaming away, way too wide, the batsman was down the track to smash that through the off but couldn't reach it
four overthrows to end another good over for West Indies, pushed to mid-off, the batsmen scamper a tight single, the fielder tries to throw down the stumps, misses and there's no one backing up
on target straightaway, on middle stump, defended by the batsman
on leg stump this time, turned towards midwicket, batsmen sprint through for a single
this was a touch short, the batsman bends his knee and mows that to the midwicket boundary, West Indies are putting in a spirited effort here
down the leg side, Simmons doesn't connect with the sweep
lovely from Simmons, he decided he's not going to respect Mendis much, the reverse-sweep is brought out and he slaps it over point for a boundary
backs away and looks to crack it inside out over the covers but doesn't connect
Murali starts with a ball just outside off, played with soft hands towards the off side
nothing soft about that, looking for a wild heave over square leg but doesn't connect and is hit on the body
this is much better from Simmons, makes a bit of room and powers a slightly ovepitched ball through extra cover
Murali strikes, that's the end of Simmons,a touch shorter than the last time, Simmons was backing away, looking to cut, edges to first slip
he'll have to re-bowl that, well outside off
lunged forward to counter the spin, but is beaten, missed stumping there as Chanderpaul's backfoot had been dragged out of the crease
this time it's on middle, Chanderpaul wanted to turn it to leg, gets a leading edge back towards the bowler
West Indies lose their third wicket, Marshall looks to keep the tempo up by slamming Mendis over mid-off, it's miscued and Chamara Silva has a simple catch to take which ends Marshall's stay
Chanderpaul shuffles across and looks to cut, bottom edge takes the ball towards backward point
turned to square leg for a single this time
a touch short and turning in to Sarwan, who stays on the back foot and punches through the covers
Magic from Mendis, he gets the big wicket of Chanderpaul, who was looking to play the ball towards the covers, gets an inside-edge and is bowled, West Indies in big trouble now
sliding down the leg, new man Bravo works that towards square leg for a single to get off the mark
some turn for Murali there, Bravo wanted to flick that to fine leg but doesn't quite get hold of it
a touch shorter from Murali, Bravo gets on the back foot and wrists it towards square leg
Murali tying the batsmen down with his round-the-wicket attack, Sarwan can only nudge this towards square leg for a single
Bravo was looking to defend off the front foot but he is beaten by that one
Bravo tries to scythe this through the covers, but is beaten by the turn again, this is another good over for Sri Lanka
another dot ball to end the over, only two off it, Bravo can only defend it back down the pitch
ooh, that was a tough chance, a length ball just outside off, Sarwan whacks it towards sweeper cover, where Mendis catches it low and diving forward, but he can't hang on as his hands hit the ground
short and wide, very slow from Udana, Bravo still wants to swing it away to midwicket, doesn't make contact
this one is normal speed, on a length, on middle, Bravo drops it towards mid-on, no run again
very wide from Udana, Bravo cuts that straight to the fielder, another dot ball

close call for Bravo there, he swings this one to the long-on boundary, doesn't quite have enough power behind that one, Murali takes the catch on the boundary but the momentum would have taken him over, he drops the ball into the filed of play and goes over the line, the ball rolls over the rope for a four, great effort but couldn't pull off what Adam Voges did earlier this year
Jayasuriya's first ball of a new spell is punched firmly towards mid-off
swept down to long leg for a single this time
Jayasuriya drops it short, Bravo isn't going to miss out on these, he rocks back, picks his spot and crashes it to midwicket
cramped for room there, chopped towards point for a quick single
another short ball, just outside off, Sarwan stays on the backfoot and crashes it towards long-off, just a single
great way for West Indies to finish the over, length ball and Bravo dismisses that with an eye-catching front-foot drive over long-off
turns it to short mid wicket, straight to the fielder
driven off the backfoot to long-off for a single by Sarwan
on offstump, Bravo opens the face and gets it away towards backward point
slight overpitched outside off, crunched down to long-off for a single
Bravo using his feet against Mendis, who sees the batsman advancing and drops it short, Bravo turns it towards midwicket
it short again and outside off, carved past point for a couple by Bravo
overpitched on legstump, Sarwan swings it down to long-on, one bounce to the fielder
straighter ball from Murali, Bravo playing for the turn and he is beaten
Bravo looks to flick that one ball but is hit on the pads outside leg
goes for the sweep this time, and the extra bounce does his in, struck in front of middle but the bounce might have taken the ball over the stumps
driven off the back foot to deep backward point for a couple to end another tight over
starts with a length ball on leg stump which is swung away to wide long-on by Sarwan
slower ball from Udana, on legstump again, Sarwan was early onto the shot, was in the air as it flew towards mid-on
Bravo wanted to send that one into orbit, but gets a bottom edge and the ball trickles towards point
shortish ball, angling across the batsman, Sarwan steps away from the stumps and cuts that towards sweeper cover
fires it into the blockhole, dug out by Bravo by only as far as the bowler
superb yorker to end the over, on middle stump, Bravo was in all sorts of trouble there trying to keep it out, just about manages to
a touch short, Sarwan was waltzing down the pitch, doesn't get enough power behind his off-drive which goes to long-off
swivels and slams that over midwicket, that front foot was well out of the way before that shot
good-looking drive from Bravo to long-on, just a single
overpitched on legstump, another single down to long-on
this time the Windies steal a couple to deep backward square leg
Bravo turns that one to short fine leg for a single to retain the strike
goes for the blockhole straightaway, misses by a distance, way down leg for a wide
gorgeous shot from Bravo to bring up the 50 partnership, that was overpitched down the leg stump, Bravo had backed away and he plays an inside-out lofted drive for four
great yorker from Malinga, Bravo was trying to get his feet out of the way, squeezes the ball towards the off side for a single
this is a bit wide outside off, Sarwan dabs it down to third man for a single
Bravo pulls, but timing is not very good, enough power to get it away towards midwicket for a single
length ball on legstump, Sarwan was looking to pay it inside-out, gets an inside edge towards square leg

this is a superb contest between Malinga and Bravo, the batsman was looking to back away, the ball was outside off, Bravo had to adjust and he manages  superbly, slicing it one-handed towards point, falls down as he attempts the shot

sensational commitment from Mathews at long-on, Sarwan had smashed it to the long-on boundary, Mathews took a great overhead catch, the momentum was taking him over the line, he throws the ball up in the air before crossing the rope, theb ball also crosses the boundary but it is in the air, Mathews is behind the rope but he jumps to slaps the ball back into play, ball doesn't cross the rope after that, and after an eternity of replays it is decided that will be only be a three, awesome fielding there
pushed to long-on for a single
overpitched on offstump, Sarwan is down the pitch to loft it towards long-off, Dilshan races in from the boundary, doesn't reach in time for a catch, does well to stop the ball though
full on the pads, turned to long-on for a single
After all the good fielding of the over, Murali drops a simple catch at midwicket

another mishit from Bravo, way outside off, Bravo looks to heave it to midwicket, lands safely near long-off, batsmen want to take a tight second, third umpire is called in to rule that Bravo did make his ground on the second
that's a six to bring up his half-century, big swing to take a legstump ball over the midwicket rope, great spirit from the West Indies

Bravo finally pays for throwing caution to the winds, a bit slower from Malinga, Bravo's attempted mow only connects with the bottom of the bat, and the ball swirls to give Mubarak an easy catch at mid-on
a low full toss heading for middle, Sarwan backs away and slices it over extra cover
this time Sarwan shuffles across the stumps, nudges it towards square leg for a single
played with soft hands towards point for a single to end the over
overpitched and angling into the pads, Pollard stands his ground and cracks that to the wide long-on boundary
slower ball, short and wide, Pollard goes for the swipe again, bottom edge takes it towards long-on
overpitched on legstump, dug out towards long-on for another couple
wild delivery,  high full toss down the leg side, 30 needed off nine now
length ball on middle and leg, Pollard wanted to send that to midwicket, mistimes it towards long-on
another slow full toss, wide outside off, Sarwan chops it towards point

another slower ball to end the over, the West Indies batsman haven't really picked the change of pace from Udana, this time Pollard's swing doesn't connect with the ball and it goes through to the keeper
overpitched on offstump, Sarwan carves it to sweeper cover, Murali races across at the boundary and cuts it off
low full toss from Mathews, Pollard crashes that straight down the ground for a boundary, it's raining here making it tough to grip the ball
and the ball has slipped out of Mathews' hand here, ends up as a beamer almost taking Pollard's head off, the batsman does well to get out of the way, that's a no-ball for height
good ball that, yorker on middle stump, Pollard can't do much with that one
follows that up with a poor full toss, easily dispatched to the midwicket boundary by Pollard
well bowled this time, full and on legstump, Pollard slaps it down to long-off for a single
Sarwan swipes the final ball to long-on for a single, and that seals Sri Lanka's victory
